info.title: Custom voice API
info.description: Custom voice API to create and deploy your voice.

get.description: Gets a list of projects for the authenticated Speech service resource.
Gets the project identified by the given ID.

delete.description: Deletes the project identified by the given ID. All data (like consent, training set) in this project will be deleted automatically.

parameters.name: forceDelete
parameters.description: Set this to true if you want to delete a project with model and endpoint. Otherwise, the delete operation will fail.

get.description: Gets a list of consents for the authenticated Speech service resource.
Gets the consent identified by the given ID.

delete.description: Deletes the consent identified by the given ID.

put.description: Creates a new voice talent consent with the provided audio URL.

Operation-Location.description: The location of the operation job. Use this URL to monitor operation status.

post.description: Creates a new voice talent consent with the provided audio file.

parameters.name: displayName
parameters.description: The display name of this consent.

parameters.name: audiodata
parameters.description: An audio file containing the audio data.

parameters.name: locale
parameters.description: The locale of this consent. Locale code follows BCP-47. You can find the text to speech locale list here https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/ai-services/speech-service/language-support?tabs=tts.

Operation-Location.description: The location of the operation job. Use this URL to monitor operation status.

get.description: Gets a list of training sets for the authenticated Speech service resource.
Gets the training set identified by the given ID.

delete.description: Deletes the training set identified by the given ID.

post.description: Uploads data to the specified training set.

Operation-Location.description: The location of the operation job. Use this URL to monitor operation status.

get.description: Get a list of supported recipes for model building. Different recipes have different capabilities such as support for multi-style voice models.
Gets the list of models for the authenticated Speech service resource.
Gets the model identified by the given ID.

delete.description: Deletes the model identified by the given ID.

Operation-Location.description: The location of the operation job. Use this URL to monitor operation status.

get.description: Gets a list of endpoints for the authenticated Speech service resource.
Gets the endpoint identified by the given ID.

delete.description: Deletes the endpoint identified by the given ID.

Operation-Location.description: The location of the operation job. Use this URL to monitor operation status.

post.description: Resumes the endpoint identified by the given ID.

Operation-Location.description: The location of the operation job. Use this URL to monitor operation status.

post.description: Suspends the endpoint identified by the given ID.

Operation-Location.description: The location of the operation job. Use this URL to monitor operation status.

get.description: Gets a list of base models.
Gets a list of personal voices for the authenticated Speech service resource.
Gets the personal voice identified by the given ID.

delete.description: Deletes the personal voice identified by the given ID.

put.description: Creates a new personal voice with audio files in Azure Blob Storage.

Operation-Location.description: The location of the operation job. Use this URL to monitor operation status.

post.description: Creates a new personal voice with audio files in the client.

parameters.name: displayName
parameters.description: The display name of this model.

Operation-Location.description: The location of the operation job. Use this URL to monitor operation status.

AzureBlobContentSource.description: Azure Blob Storage content. With the examples below, it represents files https://contoso.blob.core.windows.net/voicecontainer/jessica/*.wav

containerUrl.description: Azure Blob Storage container URL with [SAS](https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/storage/common/storage-sas-overview). Need both read and list permissions.

releaseDateTime.description: The stamp when the base model was released. The timestamp is encoded as ISO 8601 date and time format ("YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ", see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601#Combined_date_and_time_representations).

expirationDateTime.description: The timestamp when TTS service will stop serving this base model. The timestamp is encoded as ISO 8601 date and time format ("YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ", see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601#Combined_date_and_time_representations).

voiceTalentName.description: Voice talent name. Must match the voice talent name in the consent audio file.

companyName.description: Company name. Must match the company name in the consent audio file.

audioUrl.description: The public accessible URL of the consent audio file. It's recommended to be an Azure blob URL with [SAS](https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/storage/common/storage-sas-overview). This property is only available in request.

locale.description: The locale of this consent. Locale code follows BCP-47. You can find the text to speech locale list here https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/ai-services/speech-service/language-support?tabs=tts.

createdDateTime.description: The timestamp when the object was created. The timestamp is encoded as ISO 8601 date and time format ("YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ", see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601#Combined_date_and_time_representations)

lastActionDateTime.description: The timestamp when the current status was entered. The timestamp is encoded as ISO 8601 date and time format ("YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ", see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601#Combined_date_and_time_representations).

values.description: The consent audio mismatch with verbal statement. Please check [verbal-statement](https://github.com/Azure-Samples/Cognitive-Speech-TTS/blob/master/CustomVoice/script/verbal-statement-all-locales.txt).

createdDateTime.description: The timestamp when the object was created. The timestamp is encoded as ISO 8601 date and time format ("YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ", see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601#Combined_date_and_time_representations).

lastActionDateTime.description: The timestamp when the current status was entered. The timestamp is encoded as ISO 8601 date and time format ("YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ", see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601#Combined_date_and_time_representations).

Error.description: Top-level error follows Microsoft Azure REST API Guidelines which is available at https://github.com/microsoft/api-guidelines/blob/vNext/azure/Guidelines.md#handling-errors. This contains an top-level error with error code, message, details, target and an inner error with more descriptive details.

target.description: The source of the error. For example it would be "model" or "model id" in case of invalid model.

details.description: Additional supportive details regarding the error and/or expected policies.

ErrorResponse.description: Error response follows Microsoft Azure REST API Guidelines which is available at https://github.com/microsoft/api-guidelines/blob/vNext/azure/Guidelines.md#handling-errors.

InnerError.description: Inner error follows Microsoft Azure REST API Guidelines which is available at https://github.com/microsoft/api-guidelines/blob/vNext/azure/Guidelines.md#handling-errors. This contains required properties error code, message and optional properties target, inner error(this can be nested).

code.description: Detailed error code to help diagnostic.

target.description: The source of the error. For example it would be "model" or "model id" in case of invalid model.

locale.description: The locale of this model. Locale code follows BCP-47. You can find the text to speech locale list here https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/ai-services/speech-service/language-support?tabs=tts.

engineVersion.description: Engine version. Update this version can get the latest pronunciation bug fixing.

createdDateTime.description: The timestamp when the object was created. The timestamp is encoded as ISO 8601 date and time format ("YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ", see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601#Combined_date_and_time_representations).

lastActionDateTime.description: The timestamp when the current status was entered. The timestamp is encoded as ISO 8601 date and time format ("YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ", see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601#Combined_date_and_time_representations).

values.description: The customer uses Bring Your Own Storage in Speech Account. But the storage is not accessible now. Please check [doc](https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/ai-services/speech-service/bring-your-own-storage-speech-resource?tabs=portal#configure-byos-associated-storage-account).
The consent and training audio are not from the same speaker.

styleTrainingSetIds.description: Customized styles and associated training sets.

voiceStyles.description: All styles supported by this model.

Operation.description: Status of a long running operation.

PresetStyleItem.description: Preset styles supported by the recipe. The voice model can support these styles without any style training set.

male.description: Preset styles supported on male voice model.

female.description: Preset styles supported on female voice model.

Project.description: Project object. Consents, training sets, models, and endpoints are organized in a project.

createdDateTime.description: The timestamp when the object was created. The timestamp is encoded as ISO 8601 date and time format ("YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ", see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601#Combined_date_and_time_representations).

Recipe.description: Recipe for model building. Different recipes have different capability.

minUtteranceCount.description: Minimum utterance count required to train a voice model with this recipe.

minStyleUtteranceCount.description: Minimum utterance count required to train each customized style.

maxCustomStyleNum.description: Maximum customized style number supported in one voice model.

datasetLocales.description: The locale of the training dataset. Locale code follows BCP-47. You can find the text to speech locale list here https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/ai-services/speech-service/language-support?tabs=tts.

modelLocales.description: The locale that a voice model can speak with this recipe. Locale code follows BCP-47. You can find the text to speech locale list here https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/ai-services/speech-service/language-support?tabs=tts.

presetStyles.description: Preset styles supported by this recipe per locale. You can get these styles without any style training set.

locale.description: The locale of the training dataset. Locale code follows BCP-47. You can find the text to speech locale list here https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/ai-services/speech-service/language-support?tabs=tts.

createdDateTime.description: The timestamp when the object was created. The timestamp is encoded as ISO 8601 date and time format ("YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ", see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601#Combined_date_and_time_representations).

lastActionDateTime.description: The timestamp when the current status was entered. The timestamp is encoded as ISO 8601 date and time format ("YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ", see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601#Combined_date_and_time_representations).

utteranceCount.description: Utterance count in this training set

speakerProfileId.description: Personal voice speaker profile id. Fill this property in SSML.

createdDateTime.description: The timestamp when the object was created. The timestamp is encoded as ISO 8601 date and time format ("YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ", see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601#Combined_date_and_time_representations).

lastActionDateTime.description: The timestamp when the current status was entered. The timestamp is encoded as ISO 8601 date and time format ("YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ", see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601#Combined_date_and_time_representations).

subscription_key.name: Ocp-Apim-Subscription-Key
subscription_key.description: Provide your Speech resource key here.

parameters.name: endpoint
parameters.description: Supported Cognitive Services endpoints (protocol and hostname, for example: https://eastus.api.cognitive.microsoft.com).

QueryApiVersion.name: api-version
QueryApiVersion.description: The API version to use for this operation.

QuerySkip.name: skip
QuerySkip.description: The number of result items to skip.

QueryMaxPageSize.name: maxpagesize
QueryMaxPageSize.description: The maximum number of items to include in a single response.

QueryFilter.name: filter
QueryFilter.description:
Filter condition.
  - **Supported properties:** projectId, createdDateTime, locale, kind
  - **Operators:**
    - eq, ne are supported for all properties.
    - gt, ge, lt, le are supported for createdDateTime.
  - **Example:**
    - ```filter=projectId eq 'Jessica'``` (filter by project ID)
    - ```filter=kind eq 'ProfessionalVoice'``` (filter project by kind)
    - ```filter=locale eq 'en-US'``` (filter training set and model by locale)
    - ```filter=createdDateTime gt 2022-12-30T23:59:59.99Z``` (filter resource created time after 2023-11-01)

PathUuid.name: id
PathUuid.description: The resource ID, which should be UUID.

HeaderOperationId.name: Operation-Id
HeaderOperationId.description: ID of the status monitor for the operation. If the Operation-Id header matches an existing operation and the request is not identical to the prior request, it will fail with a 400 Bad Request.
